title: Working with Variables
description: Learn how to use and modify variables in your code

screens.prompt: Can you change the value of a variable after creating it?
screens.end_comment: Yes! Variables can be updated with new values anytime.

screens.content: Here's how you update a variable:|score = 10|score = score + 5  # Now score is 15|score = 20        # Now score is 20

screens.prompt: If x = 5 and y = 3, what is x + y?
screens.end_comment: Correct! 5 + 3 = 8. We add the numeric values.

summary: ✅ Variables can be updated with new values
✅ You can do math with number variables
